scripts.cleanup: rm -rf build/ && mkdir build && rm -rf lib/ && mkdir lib
scripts.compile: npm run cleanup && truffle compile --all && npm run build
scripts.deploy: npm run cleanup && truffle migrate --reset && npm run build
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: npm run cleanup && truffle migrate --reset --network rinkeby && npm run build
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && npm run solidity-coverage
